job.title: Software Engineer III - Marketplace
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: ACVs mission is to build and enable the most trusted and efficient digital marketplaces for buying and selling used vehicles with transparency and comprehensive data that was previously unimaginable We are powered by a combination of the worlds best people and the industrys best technology At ACV we are driven by an entrepreneurial spirit and rewarded with a work environment that enables each Teammate to impact the company from day one ACVs network of brands includes ACV Auctions ACV Transportation and ACV Capital within its Marketplace Products as well as True360 and Data ServicesbrbrstronguWhat Are We Looking ForbrbrustrongAs a Software Engineer III at ACV Auctions you will develop write and modify code You will work alongside software and production engineers to build and ship new features that optimize operational efficiency and drive growthbrbrstronguWhat You Will Be Doingbrustrongul li Design develop and maintain code for our Vuejs based web application and component design libraryli li Collaborate with software and production engineers to design scalable web components plan feature rollout and ensure high reliability and performance of our productsli li Conduct code reviews develop highquality documentation and build robust test suites for your products with unit and integration testsli li Work with other frontend engineers to define and enforce code standards based on industry best practicesli li Develop roadmaps and prioritizes technical debt to effectively plan features and workli li Able to lead and successfully complete software projects without major guidance from a managerleadli li Lead in team discussions to define requirements on new and current products as neededli li Provide technical support for many applications within the technology portfolioli li Respond to and troubleshoot complex problems quickly efficiently and effectivelyli li Handle multiple competing priorities in an agile fastpaced environmentli brbrulstronguWhat You Will Needbrustrongul li BS degree in Computer Science or a related technical discipline or equivalent practical experienceli li Minimum 4 years of experience with the following web technologies JavaScript CSS HTML REST JSON HTTPli li Experience with any of the following frameworks is a plus Vuejs React Angular Vuex Axios Redux Flux Vuelidate TailwindCSS Bootstrap SASS Storybookli li Minimum 4 years of experience working with continuous integration and build toolsli li Experience with any of the following continuous integration and build tools is a plus Jenkins Jenkins Pipelines Groovy Scriptingli li Deep knowledge in dayday tools and how they work including deployments k8s monitoring systems and testing toolsli li Highly proficient in version control systems including trunk based development multiple release planning cherry picking and rebaseli li Selfsufficient debugger who can identify and solve complex problems in codeli li Deep understanding of major data structures arrays dictionaries stringsli brbrulstronguWhat We Will Offerbrustrongul li Competitive salary and benefitsli li Upbeat innovative cultureli li Professional training opportunitiesli li Flexible schedulesli brulemAt ACV we are committed to an inclusive culture in which every individual is welcomed and empowered to celebrate their true selves We achieve
